mypage_login_description: Please log in to access more features
mypage_faq_question_1: How do I use the service?
mypage_faq_answer_1: You can use the service after signing up and logging in. Please refer to the terms of service for more details.
mypage_faq_answer_2: You can use the 'Forgot Password' feature on the login page to receive a password reset link via email.
mypage_faq_question_3: I want to delete my account.
mypage_faq_answer_3: You can delete your account from the 'Account Deletion' menu in My Page. Please note that deleted accounts cannot be recovered.
mypage_faq_description: Find answers to common questions about using our service
mypage_contact_description: Feel free to contact us if you need help
mypage_notice_content_1: Guidelines for better service usage. Please check the terms of service and privacy policy.
mypage_notice_content_2: New features have been added. Please check the updated content for more convenient service usage.
mypage_notice_content_3: System maintenance is scheduled for service stabilization. Service usage may be limited during maintenance hours.

login_required.title: Login Required
login_required.description: You need to log in to use this feature. Would you like to go to the login page?

login_required.title: Login Required to Vote
login_required.description: You need to log in to participate in this vote. Would you like to log in?
login_required.description_with_artist: You need to log in to vote for {artistName}. Would you like to log in?
